meta.job_title: Director, Commercial, Program and Acquisition Controlling

duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze program profitability and financial performance to improve company profitability.
Manage budgeting, long-range strategic planning, and month-end reporting.
Contribute to analysis of variances and propose corrective actions.
Develop, execute, and control internal procedures, including spending authorizations.
Contribute to business plans elaboration and financial justifications for new business acquisition.
Review financial impact of current and future operations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in Finance or Accounting is required. Demonstrated use of SAP and advanced Excel/Database skills. Prior experience working in a Tier 1 automotive supplier working in Commercial or Purchasing Finance.
